responsibilities: Integrated new simulation into the existing simulation ecosystem
Maintained existing simulations and simulation environment
Collected real world data and transformed into the simulation environment
Showcased projects to technical and non-tecehnical stakeholders
content.description: My one year undergraduate internship with Thales Group enabled me to have hands on experience with a complex legacy production system. The simulations were developed in C++ and involved exchanges between both the user, the environment and other users participating in the simulation.
